sections.purpose: To collect non-sharp biomedical and laboratory waste safely before final disposal.
sections.scope: Applicable to Pharmacology laboratories and animal facilities.
procedure: Line the container with appropriate color-coded biomedical waste bags.
Discard compatible waste materials such as soiled gauze, disposable PPE, and animal bedding.
Do not overfill; close and seal bags when they reach the recommended fill level.
Label bags with department and date before transfer to central waste collection.
Clean and disinfect reusable containers regularly.
precautions: Do not dispose of sharps in these containers.
Segregate waste strictly according to biomedical waste categories.
Wear PPE when handling waste bags.
Follow institutional and legal biomedical waste regulations.
